original_text: For ye shall go out with joy, and be led forth with peace: the mountains and the hills shall break forth before you into singing, and all the trees of the field shall clap their hands.
korean_text: 너희는 기쁨으로 나아가며 평안히 인도함을 받을 것이요 산들과 언덕들이 너희 앞에서 노래를 발하고 들의 모든 나무가 손뼉을 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: For ye shall go out with joy
and be led forth with peace
mountains and hills shall break forth before you
sentences.korean_translation: 산들과 언덕들이 너희 앞에서 소리를 내며

sentences.original_text: and all the trees of the field shall clap their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 밭의 모든 나무가 손뼉을 칠 것이니라
